text: Carlton Michael George Cole (born 12 October 1983) is an English football coach and former professional footballer who played as a striker. He scored 52 goals in 288 Premier League games for four clubs. He played seven games for the England national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National cup National cup
